entry.title: New Release - 0.1.0
entry.content:
Initial Release

This is the initial release of the Cake.Grunt Addin for Cake. This is essentially a port of the Cake.Gulp. Full credit to Ken Lea for doing this work!

Please do not hesitate to reach out in [GitHub Discussions][https://github.com/cake-build/cake/discussions/categories/extension-requests] if you have any issues using this addin.
entry.summary: This is the initial release of the Cake.Grunt Addin for Cake. This is essentially a port of the Cake.Gulp. Full credit to Ken Lea for doing this work!
